channel.title: Job War Rock Crobar Matiss Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Job War Rock Crobar Matiss Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: congratulations hiromi
item.description: hiromi graduated from the art institute on saturday. good job. here are the pictures. my parents came out and hiromi, matiss and myself all hung out with them. it ruled. I had a lot of fun. and I think everyone else did as well. on friday - we went to a party at hiromi’s friend rachels house. it was a lot of fun. my father and me rule. haha. afterwards I went to a couple other parties and then made it to crobar.
